name: Deep Yawn: Undersprawl
description:
Set as a sequel to the transmedia interactive fiction project Daudinsfall, Undersprawl continues the story of a sailor shipwrecked on a deadly island with no means of escape!

In Daudinsfall, you explore treacherous beaches, decaying swamps, and gaping sink holes only to stumble upon an abandoned colonial village!

Undersprawl continues the story after the monster dwelling in the colony drags you underground through the village well! Explore volcanic caverns, haunted mines, underground rivers, ancient temples, and much more! Collect items to increase your chances of survival, but don't take too long, that monster just might return for a snack!

While many features are still currently in development, the core idea of the game is present for you to sink your teeth into!

  • Numerous branching narratives
  • Multiple endings
  • Inventory system
  • Monster events
  • Strong player agency
  • Varied environments
  • ...and much more!
